CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 16, 1961, pg. A3 reads: " 'New Era' Dawns at Herron Hill Junior High - Helping Hand - Mrs. Bertha Pinckney, counselor, is shown helping Miss Iris Hicks, a pupil, to adjust herself in school."
TitMainTitle: Bertha Pinckney wearing striped dress, facing student Iris Hicks, seated at desk in office of Herron Hill Junior High School
